Package com.simpleecm.imageprocessing.operation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SECMImageExportOperation.OnExportImagesListener  
    SECMImageExportOperation.OnExportPDFListener  
    SECMImageOperationManager.OnImageOperationListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SECMBrightnessAndContrastOperation
    Manage a operation for changing brightness and contrast
    SECMConvertToBlackAndWhiteOperation
    Manage a operation for converting to back and white
    SECMConvertToGrayscaleOperation
    Manage a operation for converting to grayscale
    SECMDewarpOperation
    Manage a operation for dewarping
    SECMImageExportOperation
    SECMImageExportOperation helps to export bitmaps to image or PDF file(s) without blocking the UI thread.
    SECMImageOperation
    Abstract class that helps to perform operation to a SECMImage object without blocking the UI thread.
    SECMImageOperationManager
    Manager for image operation in background thread
    SECMRotationOperation
    Manage a rotation operation
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SECMImageExportOperation.ExportFormat
    File export format
